screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .cpt file in Corel PHOTO-PAINT 2023
screenshot.caption: CPT file open in Corel PHOTO-PAINT 2023

description: Amateur and professional photographers and graphic designers may use Corel PHOTO-PAINT to create or edit images for various purposes. Examples include advertisements, photo collages, social media and web graphics, and artistic illustrations.

When you save an image with PHOTO-PAINT, the application creates the CPT file, by default, to store the image and all the edits you have applied. After saving the CPT file, you can close it and re-open it to apply future edits.
To create a CPT file with PHOTO-PAINT:
